seoTitle: A clear, concise SEO title goes here. This should contain your primary keyword. If left empty, it will be auto generated from the article title.
metaDescription: Here, write a brief summary of the page. This should include your primary keyword and should be enticing to readers. If left empty, it will be auto generated from your content.
title: The main title of your article goes here.

content.title: Subheading for this section
content.content: Here, write a detailed paragraph related to the subheading.

content.title: Another subheading for a different section
content.content: Here, write another detailed paragraph related to the new subheading.
